item.title: Bugs
item.description: Unfortunately for everyone, I write software with bugs. Most emails/issues I receive do not contain enough information for me to provide any way forward. The intent of this post is to provide some direction on how to send useful bug reports. If a user has sent me an email indicating that my software has a bug, then, she has a prior that the fault is in the software. If I have received such an email, then in most cases, I have a strong prior that something is wrong with his usage, input, or OS (ahem, windows).
